pages.text: When one is stuck, as one says, between a rock and a hard place, not much can be done - sometimes, $(thing)death$() just has to be accepted as an occurence.$(p)That's what magical botanists used to think before they realized that $(thing)death itself$() could be $()averted$() using something as simple as a ring: The $(item)Ring of Last Chance$(), when placed anywhere in the user's
inventory, will prevent their death by healing them and $(thing)disappearing$() in the process, similary to the $(item)Totem of Undying$().
